actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2085) entitled "A bill for the relief of Mr. Donald Shrope and Mrs. Guadalupe L. Shrope" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 2085 to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims and directs the Commissioner to report to the Senate on such amounts legally or equitably due from the United States to the claimants.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2085) entitled "A bill for the relief of Mr. Donald Shrope and Mrs. Guadalupe L. Shrope" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.
